issue.title: [R] Replace usage of iris dataset in tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's not a particularly interesting dataset to test with anyway.
